original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, where you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations. As a key player, you will ensure our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently, with a strong focus on developing new processes and technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space. This position will leverage the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to quickly develop innovative solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, which includes developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, which may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools.
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) implementation
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and systems

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of implementing ML and AI solutions
- Hands-on experience in system configuration and implementation

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes

Required Tools:
- [Mention specific system] configuration tools
- Database querying and reporting tools
- Data visualization and analysis tools

This role presents a unique opportunity to blend your exceptional business acumen with your technical proficiency, enabling you to play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for translating complex business processes into effective system configurations, with a focus on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space. By leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), you will drive the development of cutting-edge solutions that streamline our operations and enhance our competitive edge.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate seamlessly with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate these business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, which includes developing and maintaining comprehensive configuration specifications, creating and modifying intricate data mappings and integrations, implementing and thoroughly testing new configurations, and swiftly resolving any configuration-related issues that may arise.
- Analyze existing data to uncover valuable insights, identify trends and inefficiencies, and pinpoint opportunities for improvement. This may involve advanced database querying, sophisticated reporting, and the utilization of state-of-the-art data visualization tools.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and optimize system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the implementation of industry-leading best practices.
- Ensure the highest level of quality by thoroughly testing configurations to validate that they meet all requirements and function flawlessly. Collaborate closely with the user acceptance testing (UAT) team to validate the system's performance.
- Maintain comprehensive, well-organized documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Forge strong partnerships with developers, IT support, and other key stakeholders to guarantee seamless implementation and continuous, reliable support for the system configurations you have designed.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities
- Outstanding communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills
- Proven expertise in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with a demonstrated ability to apply these skills in a business context

Preferred Skills:
- Extensive experience in the successful implementation of ML and AI solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a dynamic, fast-paced environment
- Deep understanding of vehicle configuration processes and systems

Required Experience:
- Substantial track record of delivering impactful ML and AI projects
- Hands-on experience in the configuration and implementation of complex enterprise systems

Preferred Experience:
- Proven success working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams
- Familiarity with the unique challenges and requirements of vehicle configuration systems

Required Tools:
- Comprehensive suite of [mention specific system] configuration tools
- Advanced database querying and reporting tools
- Cutting-edge data visualization and analysis platforms
